analyzed: avalokita īśvara aṣṭottaraśata nāma stotram
translated: The Praise of the One Hundred and Eight Names of Avalokiteśvara

analyzed: om namaḥ uvalokiteśvarāya
translated: Om, homage to Avalokiteśvara

analyzed: padmasattva mahāpadma lokeśvara maheśvara
translated: Padmasattva, great lotus, lord of the world, great lord,

analyzed: avalokita īśa dhīra agrya vajra dharma namaḥ astu te
translated: Avalokiteśvara, foremost in wisdom, vajra dharma, homage to you.

analyzed: dharmarāja mahāśuddha sattvarāja mahāmate
translated: King of Dharma, greatly pure, king of beings, of great intellect,

analyzed: padma ātmaka mahā padma padmanātha namaḥ astu te
translated: Padma nature, great lotus, lord of the lotus, homage to you.
Arisen from the lotus, beautiful like a lotus, purified by the lotus, excellent purifier,

analyzed: vajrapadma su padma aṅka padmapadma namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Vajra lotus, marked with an excellent lotus, lotus of the lotus, homage to you.

analyzed: mahā viśva mahā loka mahā kāya mahā upama
translated: Great universe, great light, great body, comparable to the great,

analyzed: mahā dhīra mahāvīra mahāśaure namaḥ astu te
translated: Greatly courageous, great hero, of great valor, homage to you.

analyzed: sattva āśaya mahāyāna mahā yoga pitāmaha
translated: Intention of beings, great vehicle, great yoga, grandfather,

original: śambhu śaṅkara śuddhārtha buddhapadma namo'stu te // //
analyzed: śambhu śaṅkara śuddhārtha buddha padma namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Auspicious, benevolent, pure in purpose, lotus of the Buddha, homage to you.

analyzed: dharma tattva artha saddharma su dharma kṛt
translated: Truth of the Dharma, true Dharma, pure Dharma, maker of good Dharma,

analyzed: mahā dharma sudharma agrya dharma cakra namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Great Dharma, foremost in good Dharma, wheel of Dharma, homage to you.

analyzed: buddha sattva su sattva agrya dharmasattva su sattva dhṛk
translated: Being of the Buddha, foremost in good beings, being of the Dharma, upholder of good beings,

analyzed: sattva uttama su sattva jña sattva sattva namaḥ astu te
translated: Supreme being, well-knowing being, being of beings, homage to you!

analyzed: avalokiteśa nātha agrya mahānātha vilokita
translated: Avalokiteśvara, foremost lord, great lord, observer,

analyzed: āloka loka loka artha lokanātha namaḥ astu te
translated: Light of the world, for the sake of the world, lord of the world, homage to you!

analyzed: loka akṣara akṣara mahā akṣara agrya akṣara upama
translated: Imperishable syllable of the world, great, like the foremost imperishable syllable,

analyzed: akṣara akṣara sarva akṣa cakra akṣara namaḥ astu te
translated: Imperishable syllable, all syllables, syllable of the wheel, homage to you!

analyzed: padma hasta mahā hasta samāśvāsaka dāyaka
translated: Lotus-handed, great-handed, comfort-giver, giver of gifts,

analyzed: buddha dharma mahābuddha buddha ātmaka namaḥ astu te
translated: Buddha-dharma, great buddha, having the nature of the Buddha, homage to you!

analyzed: buddharūpa mahārūpa vajrarūpa
translated: Buddha-form, great form, vajra-form, knower of good form,

analyzed: dharma āloka su teja agrya loka āloka namaḥ astu te
translated: Light of the Dharma, foremost in splendor, light of the world, homage to you!

analyzed: padmaśrī nātha nātha agrya dharmaśrī nātha nāthavān
translated: Lotus-glory lord, foremost lord, Dharma-glory lord, having a lord,

analyzed: brahya nātha mahā brahma brahma putra namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Lord of Brahmā, great Brahmā, son of Brahmā, homage to you!

original: dīpa dīpāgrya dīpogra dīpāloka sudīpaka /🔽dīpanātha mahādipa buddhadīpa namo'stu te // //
analyzed: dīpa dīpa agrya dīpa ugra dīpa āloka su dīpaka  dīpanātha mahā dipa buddhadīpa namaḥ astu te
translated: Lamp, foremost lamp, fierce lamp, light of the lamp, very bright lamp,🔽Lamp-lord, great lamp, Buddha-lamp, homage to you!

analyzed: buddha abhiṣikta buddha agrya buddha putra mahā budha
translated: Consecrated by the Buddha, foremost Buddha, son of the Buddha, great wise one,

analyzed: buddha abhiṣeka murddha agrya buddha buddha namaḥ astu te
translated: Crown of the consecration of the buddhas, enlightened one of the buddhas, homage to you!

analyzed: buddha cakṣo mahā cakṣo dharma cakṣo mahā īkṣaṇa
translated: Eye of the buddhas, great eye, eye of Dharma, great seer,

analyzed: samādhi jñāna sarvasva vajranetra namaḥ astu te
translated: Essence of the knowledge of concentration, vajra eye, homage to you!

analyzed: evam sarva ātmanā gauṇam nāmnām aṣṭaśatam tava
translated: Thus, with one's whole being, one should contemplate or praise your one hundred and eight names, which are secondary.

analyzed: bhāvayet stunuyāt vā api loka aiśvaryam avāpnuyāt
translated: One will attain the lordship of the world.

analyzed: ārya avalokiteśvara nāma aṣṭottaraśata adhyeṣaṇā stotram samāptam
translated: The Praise of One Hundred and Eight Names of Noble Avalokiteśvara is completed.
